summary: CrypCade City - CrypCade City is a groundbreaking multichain metaverse built for the Web 3.0, built in Unity, offering a variety of features from every sector, with focus on social interactions (life simulation, written and audio chats, party simulator, renting and purchasing of real estate, jobs, virtual 3D AMA, concerts etc), business integrations, virtual 3D meeting rooms to facilitate WFH interactions and presentations, shopping with AR and VR support, advertising, seamless AI features integration, financing, earning opportunities, entertainment etc., all combined into one multiverse with 7 different environments, one for each sector, available on any device at AAA quality through cloud rendering.
